column1: #Text=Katara says : " Oh ... you 've all gotten so big . "
#Text=Jinora says : " We missed you , Aunt Kya . "
#Text=Kya says : " Ohh , I missed you , too .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I hope you 're not getting my daughter into anymore trouble up in the city .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh ... No ... uh ... I ... no .
#Text=" Korra says : " Knock it off , Dad .
#Text=Look at all these people that came out to greet us .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " The great chief of the Northern Water Tribe comes to grace us with his presence .
#Text=" Senna says : " Just relax Tonraq , he 'll be gone soon enough .
